messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Something that's been bothering me aboutthis  list...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi, Carol -- When you get worried about your kids learning enough , what has helped you in the past? That strikes me as a really great topic to pursue.
messages.messageBody:
Carol Gilliam wrote:

> I know I will get in trouble for saying this, but I rejoined this list a few
> weeks ago in order to get some inspiration and support for unschooling. I
> still flucutate between unschooling and worrying about whether my kids are
> learning "enough".

Hi, Carol --

When you get worried about your kids learning "enough", what has helped you in
the past?

That strikes me as a really great topic to pursue. Something most of us on the
list need at one time or another.

Betsy
